text: Anam Biswas is a Bangladeshi Director, screenwriter, composer and writer. He is the director and screenwriter of Debi, released in 2018. In 2016, he won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Screenplay for the film Aynabaji. ==Selected films== ===As a Composer=== * Dub Satar - 2011 ===As a Director=== * Debi - 2018 ===As a Screenwriter=== * Aynabaji - 2016 * Debi - 2018 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Anam Biswas
